summary: THE REAR PASSENGER AXLE FAILED, HOWEVER THE MANUFACTURER/DEALER REFUSED TO HONOR THE WARRANTY.    *JB   THIS OCCURRED WHILE THE CONSUMER WAS GOING UP A MOUNTAIN WHEN THE VEHICLE SUDDENLY WENT OUT OF CONTROL, DROPPED TO THE GROUND AND WENT INTO A RIGHT TAIL SPIN.  THE CONSUMER STRUCK ANOTHER VEHICLE ON THE LEFT REAR SIDE.   *SC  THE CONSUMER STATED THE AIR BAGS DID NOT DEPLOY.  *JB
